title: Long-Term Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program Based on Microlearning

context.additional_context: Modular design optimized for smartphone-based learning, utilizing math problems integrated with daily life contexts

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical concepts at least three times weekly through 5-minute microlearning content.
Achieve a formative assessment pass rate of over 80% in mobile learning environments.
Apply mathematical knowledge acquired via microlearning to at least two real-life scenarios (e.g., budget management, spatial calculations).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
